name: Bobby Bhattacharjee
content: Bobby Bhattacharjee, CS, UMD. Bobby Bhattacharjee Professor Department of Computer Science Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering (affiliate) University of Maryland Alfred P. Sloan Research Fellow (2004-2006). Office: 4147 A. V. Williams Building Phone: +1 301 405 1658 Fax: +1 301 405 6707 eMail: {my first name (five letters)} @ cs.umd.edu.
